titleStmt.title: A right strange and vvoonderful example of the handie vvorke of a mightie God to moove vs wretched sinners to amendement of our wicked lyues, by this lamentable spectacle for al men & women to behold, of the birth of three children borne in the parish of Paskewet, in the county of Monmouth, on Thursday, the third of February last. And are are [sic] at this present to be seene at London.
Right strange and woonderful example of the handie worke of a mightie God.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
